subject: Re: Introducing myself
author: psi_research
full_text:
Hi Carol, you'll find this to be a very lively group that is more
active than it's ever been. See ya -Bill

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Carol B." <cbreck@...> wrote:
>
> Hello all,
> 
> My name is Carol and I've been an investigator for 10+ years.  I'm
new to
> the Frank's box device, and am totally fascinated by it!  My husband
works
> in recording studios and is willing to build me my first box.  I would
> like to work with the RS hack too. I've got many great class a evp's
from
> my dvr...but I'm really looking forwards to working with Frank's Box. 
> Glad to meet y'all.
> 
> Carol B.
>
